name: Do Not Trick or Treat
description:
Do Not Trick or Treat

Trick-or-Treating has been outlawed in this small town, but today is Halloween. Can you figure out the secret behind the town's unusual abstention? This short, relaxing Halloween game invites you to uncover the mystery.

  • Music by Poor Doctor Awesome
  • With art from PandaMaru, Caz, and PVGames
  • Made during the 101 Hours #2 Game Jam (my first game jam!)
    • Break the Rules
    • Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger 
    • An Unconventional Weapon

Note that you can totally download this short Halloween game for free. The suggested donation just helps the designer recoup the cost of the music, software, and some paid visual assets.

Known Issue: The HTML5 version in your browser doesn't currently have music in Safari browsers. To listen as you play, please use Chrome or download v1.0 for Windows or Mac.
